sentences.english: Log out, then log in again. SCIM should be now the default input for all applications (go to Using SCIM to learn how to use it)

definition: five stroke input method for Chinese characters by numbered strokes, invented by Wang Yongmin 王永民 in 1983
Japanese-style emoticon, e.g. (⇀‸↼‶)
(computing) full pinyin (input method where the user types pinyin without tones, e.g. "shiqing" for 事情[shi4 qing5])

to type
(computing) input method where the user types just the initial or first letter of each syllable, e.g. "shq" or "sq" for 事情[shi4 qing5])
